title: Rinkeby faucet doesn't seem to work
body:
Getting an error insufficient funds for gas * price +value when trying to obtain rETH. .

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23108930/88477212-60f7dc80-cf3e-11ea-9a43-77dd293fbf7d.png)
Confirmed, get the same error and sometimes "getDeleteStateObject (31b98d14007bdee637298086988a0bbd31184523) error: no suitable peers available"
Restarted it, but as long as the LES discovery is disabled, we're going to keep doing this non stop.
@karalabe Same issue now, pesky ` insufficient funds for gas * price + value`. Could you wave your hand for that fix again?

@karalabe I am running into the same issue trying to get Test Eth on the kinkeby testnet

apologies to bother you but if you can restart it once more it would be greatly appreciated
@karalabe I am also getting the same issue unfortunately, any chance it could be restarted please? Thanks.
Having the same issue. Thanks for your hard work
same issue here.
yeah I can't get it to work either

Cant get it to work same thing, can anyone send me some ether if ya dont mind, may I have some more soup sir?

0xE412CB6bE5b322Ce8C0d82B9C37E683cf719D0cE

I can't get any eth on rinkeby faucet. There is no faucet alternative (#anti-consumer). I am running dry (and too lazy to switch networks)!!!
`0x903482EDd1eDeF99ef30e66257dEd3BE998930ff`

YOU DON't MISS YOUR RINKEBY ETH, TILL THAT ETH RUNS DRY
seems like only yesterday, I was building dApps
now its gone away, and I know its in a different wallet
no testing for me, or transactions for you, cant deploy....smart contracts
How long...till we see a fix? How long...till we see success...HOW LONG?
(lol thank god I'm not a lyricist)

lol I'm bored....ok have a good weekend everyone!
Same issue, any solutions in sight?
It's not working again
@karalabe when you have a chance can you take a look at this plz?
Yep, not working now either.
its not working for me either `0x621edbe5d9302dD10caBFF79FDD81dea35d57db8`
Can someone share alternative faucets? I don't want to spend my entire netflix night looking for working faucets.

Not working here either. If you could restart that would be awesome.

Also in the meantime if anyone wants to share some test coins I would appreciate it :)

`0x16c7d59468CA4A2e1bA1DcC1A866fDD47e121647`

Another guy here asking for some test coin give that the faucet is not working 0x8f08A8466388a46AEE98570478cD7391e4d4D1ba
I would really appreciate it!

Sorry, faucet is not working... are there alternate faucets availale?

According to the Netstats page it looks like the faucet node is hung - perhaps restarting will help replenish the fuacuet?  Here's the link showing issue at time of this post:
https://www.rinkeby.io/#stats

Thanks in advance!

Update -looks like faucet is back on for the moment.  If someone restarted,  Thanks!

Looks like faucet worked for a bit and is down again... unfortunately I did not receive any :)  Please reload or restart faucet, and if possible send some Rinkeby to following address.  Thanks!
0xdC3Ad42f950F12e7DbAD469267F9e48623637A31

Sorry to keep posting here... looks like the faucet started and then failed again, now showing results with following error:
     "No Ethereum address found to fund"
Are there other faucets?  I'll be happy to host one if someone can send me some Rinkeby to test with.  Otherwise will need to move to another TestNet.  Thanks, let me know how I can help!

Still go error 
"No Ethereum address found to fund"

Pls give me some coins start test, thanks!
0xCfecbaBF3E313E2Aea847B4f62DEF479fC255E44

Same error here, would love to proceed with some test ETH:
0x0067d567BFEaEcB819ca25ca37f35078FF4634CA

@pauliepontoon , @Deelux , @trazyn , @6proof , @mpetrone , @sam-woodridge , @justlucdewit 

I grabbed 18 the last time it was up and sent you each 0.5 ETH which hopefully should be enough. Let me know if any issues.
Cheers! Thanks so much!
thx!
